Profane Scourge is a Weapon Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Profane Scourge deals additional damage to Fiends and Undead. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class and Equipment.
